home.hero.title: Rub The Building: Your Cleaning Experts
home.hero.description: Welcome to Rub The Building, where cleanliness meets professionalism. Our dedicated team is committed to providing top-notch cleaning services across Belgium. From small offices to large commercial spaces, we ensure a spotless, healthy, and welcoming environment for your business.
home.usp.label: Why Rub The Building?
home.usp.title: We are the best in the business
home.usp.description: Rub The Building stands out in the cleaning industry for several key reasons. We are more than just a cleaning service; we are your partners in maintaining a pristine environment.
usp1.title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning Solutions
usp1.description: We prioritize the planet by using environmentally friendly cleaning products that are safe for your team and the environment.
usp2.title: Customized Cleaning Plans
usp2.description: Understanding that each space is unique, we offer customized cleaning plans tailored to your specific needs and schedules.
usp3.title: Highly Trained Staff
usp3.description: Our team consists of experienced and trained professionals who are dedicated to delivering high-quality cleaning services.
home.heading.label: About Rub The Building
home.heading.title: Dedicated to Cleanliness, Committed to Excellence
home.heading.description.1: At Rub The Building, we bring over a decade of cleaning expertise to your doorstep. Our skilled professionals use the latest techniques and eco-friendly products to deliver exceptional cleaning services.
home.heading.description.2: We pride ourselves on reliability, attention to detail, and a personalized approach to meet the unique needs of each client.
home.services.title: Our Cleaning Services
home.services.description: Rub The Building offers a comprehensive range of cleaning services to cater to various needs. Each service is carried out with the utmost professionalism and attention to detail.
service.1.title: General Cleaning
service.1.description: Complete cleaning solutions for offices, homes, and commercial spaces, ensuring a clean and hygienic environment.
service.2.title: Window Cleaning
service.2.description: Professional window cleaning services for streak-free, clear views that enhance the appearance of your building.
service.3.title: Large Office Cleaning
service.3.description: Specialized cleaning services for large office spaces, focusing on thoroughness and minimal disruption.
service.4.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
service.4.description: Detailed cleaning services for post-construction sites, removing all traces of construction debris and dust.
mission.1.title: General Cleaning
mission.1.description: Our General Cleaning service is the cornerstone of what we do at Rub The Building. Tailored to fit each client's specific needs, this service covers everything from dusting and vacuuming to sanitizing restrooms and kitchens. We focus on high-traffic areas and touchpoints to reduce the spread of germs, especially important in today’s health-conscious world. Our team uses a checklist to ensure no detail is overlooked, offering a thorough clean that maintains the professionalism of your space. Whether it’s a small office, a large corporate building, or your home, our general cleaning service is adaptable to any environment, ensuring a consistently clean and welcoming atmosphere.
mission.2.title: Window Cleaning
mission.2.description: Crystal-clear windows can transform the ambiance of your building. Our Window Cleaning service uses advanced techniques and eco-friendly products to leave your windows sparkling clean without any streaks or residues. Beyond just cleaning the glass, we also pay attention to window sills, frames, and screens. We handle everything from ground-level windows to high-rise buildings with the same level of precision and safety. Regular window cleaning not only improves the aesthetic appeal of your building but also prolongs the life of your windows by removing corrosive contaminants. Suitable for commercial and residential buildings, our service ensures that you can always enjoy a clear view and make a positive impression on visitors and clients.
mission.3.title: Large Office Cleaning
mission.3.description: Our Large Office Cleaning service is designed to maintain the cleanliness and professionalism of your workspace. We understand that large offices have unique cleaning needs, often requiring strategic planning to minimize disruption. Our team works efficiently to cover all areas, from individual workstations and common areas to conference rooms and restrooms. We offer after-hours cleaning to ensure that your operations remain uninterrupted. Our service includes deep cleaning of carpets, meticulous dusting of technology and equipment, and sanitation of high-contact surfaces. We also offer customizable plans to address specific concerns like allergen reduction or focusing on employee wellness areas. With Rub The Building taking care of your office cleanliness, you can provide a healthy and inviting environment for your employees and clients.
mission.4.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
mission.4.description: Post-construction cleaning is crucial in transforming a construction site into a polished and safe space. Our service covers all aspects of construction cleanup, from removing debris and dust to polishing surfaces and cleaning windows. We handle the tough dirt and grime often left behind after construction work, ensuring that the new space is habitable and presentable. Our team is equipped with the necessary tools and expertise to tackle the challenges of post-construction cleaning safely and efficiently. This service is not just about making the space look good but also about ensuring that it meets safety and hygiene standards. Whether it's a new build or a renovation, our post-construction cleaning service lays the groundwork for you to begin your operations in a clean, fresh, and welcoming environment.

home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.1.title: Do you use eco-friendly cleaning products?
faq.1.description: Yes, we use environmentally friendly products that are effective and safe for both the environment and the people in your space.
faq.2.title: Can you accommodate cleaning outside of business hours?
faq.2.description: Absolutely, we offer flexible scheduling options to ensure minimal disruption to your business operations.
faq.3.title: Are your staff insured and trained?
faq.3.description: Yes, our team is fully insured and receives ongoing training to ensure the highest standard of cleaning services.
faq.4.title: Do you offer one-time cleaning services?
faq.4.description: Yes, we provide both one-time and regular cleaning services based on your needs.
faq.5.title: How do you ensure quality in your cleaning services?
faq.5.description: YWe have a quality control process in place that includes regular inspections and client feedback to continuously improve our services.

home.testimonials.description: We are proud of our work and the results we deliver. Take a look at some of our recent projects.
testimonial.1.name: Malika
testimonial.1.description: Rub The Building transformed our office space. Their attention to detail is unmatched, and they always go the extra mile.
testimonial.2.name: Sarah
testimonial.2.description: The difference in our windows after Rub The Building's cleaning was night and day. Highly recommend their services!
testimonial.3.name: Marc
testimonial.3.description: Post-construction, our site was a mess. Rub The Building made it spotless, quickly and efficiently.
